name: Client
description: APIs which provide the full range of PlayFab features available to the client - authentication, account and data management, inventory, friends, matchmaking, reporting, and platform-specific functionality

properties.name: FriendPlayFabId
properties.description: PlayFab identifier of the user to attempt to add to the local user's friend list

properties.name: FriendUsername
properties.description: PlayFab username of the user to attempt to add to the local user's friend list

properties.name: FriendEmail
properties.description: email address of the user to attempt to add to the local user's friend list

properties.name: FriendTitleDisplayName
properties.description: title-specific display name of the user to attempt to add to the local user's friend list

properties.name: Created
properties.description: was the friend request processed successfully

properties.name: SharedGroupId
properties.description: Unique identifier for the shared group.

properties.name: PlayFabIds
properties.description: list of PlayFabIds of users to add as members of the shared group

properties.name: VirtualCurrency
properties.description: name of the virtual currency which is to be incremented

properties.name: Amount
properties.description: amount to be added to the user balance of the specified virtual currency

properties.name: DeviceToken
properties.description: unique token generated by the Google Cloud Messaging service when the title registered to receive push notifications

properties.name: SendPushNotificationConfirmation
properties.description: If true, send a test push message immediately after sucessful registration. Defaults to false.

properties.name: ConfirmationMessege
properties.description: Message to display when confirming push notification.

properties.name: ItemId
properties.description: unique identifier for the catalog item

properties.name: ItemClass
properties.description: class name to which catalog item belongs

properties.name: ItemInstanceId
properties.description: unique instance identifier for this catalog item

properties.name: DisplayName
properties.description: display name for the catalog item

properties.name: Description
properties.description: description of the catalog item

properties.name: VirtualCurrencyPrices
properties.description: the cost of the catalog item for each applicable virtual currency

properties.name: RealCurrencyPrices
properties.description: the cost of the catalog item for each applicable real world currency

properties.name: VCAmount
properties.description: the amount of each applicable virtual currency which will be received as a result of purchasing this catalog item

CatalogItem.name: CatalogItem
CatalogItem.description: A purchasable item from the item catalog

properties.name: ItemId
properties.description: unique identifier for this item

properties.name: ItemClass
properties.description: class to which the item belongs

properties.name: CatalogVersion
properties.description: catalog item for this item

properties.name: DisplayName
properties.description: text name for the item, to show in-game

properties.name: Description
properties.description: text description of item, to show in-game

properties.name: VirtualCurrencyPrices
properties.description: price of this item in virtual currencies and "RM" (the base Real Money purchase price, in USD pennies)

properties.name: RealCurrencyPrices
properties.description: override prices for this item for specific currencies

properties.name: ReleaseDate
properties.description: the date this item becomes available for purchase

properties.name: ExpirationDate
properties.description: the date this item will no longer be available for purchase

properties.name: IsFree
properties.description: (deprecated)

properties.name: NotForSale
properties.description: can this item be purchased (if not, it can still be granted by a server-based operation, such as a loot drop from a monster)

properties.name: NotForTrade
properties.description: can an instance of this item be exchanged between players?

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: list of item tags

properties.name: CustomData
properties.description: game specific custom data

properties.name: GrantedIfPlayerHas
properties.description: array of ItemId values which are evaluated when any item is added to the player inventory - if all items in this array are present, the this item will also be added to the player inventory

properties.name: Consumable
properties.description: defines the consumable properties (number of uses, timeout) for the item

properties.name: Container
properties.description: defines the container properties for the item - what items it contains, including random drop tables and virtual currencies, and what item (if any) is required to open it via the UnlockContainerItem API

properties.name: Bundle
properties.description: defines the bundle properties for the item - bundles are items which contain other items, including random drop tables and virtual currencies

properties.name: BundledItems
properties.description: unique ItemId values for all items which will be added to the player inventory when the bundle is added

properties.name: BundledResultTables
properties.description: unique TableId values for all RandomResultTable objects which are part of the bundle (random tables will be resolved and add the relevant items to the player inventory when the bundle is added)

properties.name: BundledVirtualCurrencies
properties.description: virtual currency types and balances which will be added to the player inventory when the bundle is added

properties.name: UsageCount
properties.description: number of times this object can be used, after which it will be removed from the player inventory

properties.name: UsagePeriod
properties.description: duration in seconds for how long the item will remain in the player inventory - once elapsed, the item will be removed

properties.name: UsagePeriodGroup
properties.description: all inventory item instances in the player inventory sharing a non-null UsagePeriodGroup have their UsagePeriod values added together, and share the result - when that period has elapsed, all the items in the group will be removed

CatalogItemContainerInfo.name: CatalogItemContainerInfo
CatalogItemContainerInfo.description: Containers are inventory items that can hold other items defined in the catalog, as well as virtual currency, which is added to the player inventory when the container is unlocked, using the UnlockContainerItem API. The items can be anything defined in the catalog, as well as RandomResultTable objects which will be resolved when the container is unlocked. Containers and their keys should be defined as Consumable (having a limited number of uses) in their catalog defintiions, unless the intent is for the player to be able to re-use them infinitely.

properties.name: KeyItemId
properties.description: ItemId for the catalog item used to unlock the container, if any (if not specified, a call to UnlockContainerItem will open the container, adding the contents to the player inventory and currency balances)

properties.name: ItemContents
properties.description: unique ItemId values for all items which will be added to the player inventory, once the container has been unlocked

properties.name: ResultTableContents
properties.description: unique TableId values for all RandomResultTable objects which are part of the container (once unlocked, random tables will be resolved and add the relevant items to the player inventory)

properties.name: VirtualCurrencyContents
properties.description: virtual currency types and balances which will be added to the player inventory when the container is unlocked

properties.name: OrderId
properties.description: purchase order identifier returned from StartPurchase

properties.name: OrderId
properties.description: purchase order identifier

properties.name: PurchaseDate
properties.description: date and time of the purchase

properties.name: Items
properties.description: array of items purchased

properties.name: ItemInstanceId
properties.description: unique instance identifier of the item to be consumed

properties.name: ConsumeCount
properties.description: number of uses to consume from the item

properties.name: SharedGroupId
properties.description: Unique identifier for the shared group. Leave null to have a random ID assigned

properties.name: SharedGroupId
properties.description: Unique identifier assigned to the shared group

properties.name: Region
properties.description: region to check for game instances

properties.name: BuildVersion
properties.description: version of build to match against

properties.name: IncludeState
properties.description: server state to match against (running, ended, waiting for players etc.)

properties.name: Games
properties.description: array of games found

properties.name: PlayerCount
properties.description: total number of players across all servers

properties.name: GameCount
properties.description: number of games running

properties.name: IncompleteResult
properties.description: indicates there are servers for which there was no response

properties.name: FriendPlayFabId
properties.description: PlayFab unique identifier for this friend

properties.name: Username
properties.description: PlayFab unique username for this friend

properties.name: TitleDisplayName
properties.description: title-specific display name for this friend

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: tags which have been associated with this friend

properties.name: CurrentMatchmakerLobbyId
properties.description: unique lobby identifier of the Game Server Instance to which this player is currently connected

properties.name: FacebookInfo
properties.description: available Facebook information (if the user and PlayFab friend are also connected in Facebook)

properties.name: SteamInfo
properties.description: available Steam information (if the user and PlayFab friend are also connected in Steam)

properties.name: GameCenterInfo
properties.description: available Game Center information (if the user and PlayFab friend are also connected in Game Center)

properties.name: Region
properties.description: region to which this server is associated

properties.name: LobbyID
properties.description: unique lobby identifier for this game server

properties.name: BuildVersion
properties.description: build version this server is running

properties.name: GameMode
properties.description: game mode this server is running

properties.name: MaxPlayers
properties.description: maximum players this server can support

properties.name: PlayerUsernames
properties.description: array of strings of current player names on this server (note that these are PlayFab usernames, as opposed to title display names)

properties.name: RunTime
properties.description: duration in seconds this server has been running

properties.name: GameServerState
properties.description: game specific string denoting server configuration

properties.name: TitleData
properties.description: unique client provided string - passed in at start game request - that details user defined specifics about this game server instance

properties.name: GameMode
properties.description: title-defined gameplay mode for the server instance (defaults to 0 if there is only one mode)

properties.name: GameCount
properties.description: number of game servers running

properties.name: GamePlayersCount
properties.description: number of players

properties.name: BuildVersion
properties.description: version of game server for which stats are being requested

properties.name: TitleId
properties.description: unique identifier for the title, found in the Settings > Game Properties section of the PlayFab developer site when a title has been selected

properties.name: Regions
properties.description: array of regions found matching the request parameters

properties.name: PlayFabId
properties.description: PlayFabId of the user to load data for. Optional, defaults to yourself if not set.

properties.name: AccountInfo
properties.description: account information for the local user

properties.name: CatalogVersion
properties.description: which catalog is being requested

properties.name: Catalog
properties.description: array of inventory objects

properties.name: IncludeSteamFriends
properties.description: indicates whether Steam service friends should also be included in the response

properties.name: Friends
properties.description: array of friends found

properties.name: StatisticName
properties.description: statistic used to rank players for this leaderboard

properties.name: MaxResultsCount
properties.description: maximum number of entries to retrieve

properties.name: Leaderboard
properties.description: ordered listing of users and their positions in the requested leaderboard

properties.name: StatisticName
properties.description: statistic used to rank players for this leaderboard

properties.name: StartPosition
properties.description: position in the leaderboard to start this listing (defaults to the first entry)

properties.name: MaxResultsCount
properties.description: maximum number of entries to retrieve

properties.name: Leaderboard
properties.description: ordered listing of users and their positions in the requested leaderboard

properties.name: SharedGroupId
properties.description: Unique identifier for the shared group to load data from

properties.name: Keys
properties.description: specific keys to search for in the shared group's user data. Leave null to get all keys. Set to an empty array to get no keys.

properties.name: GetMembers
properties.description: if true, also return the list of member of the shared group. Defaults to false if not specified

properties.name: Data
properties.description: data for this shared data group

properties.name: Members
properties.description: List of PlayFabIds of the members of this group, if requested

properties.name: StoreId
properties.description: which store is being requested

properties.name: Store
properties.description: array of store items

properties.name: Keys
properties.description: array of keys to get back data from the TitleData data blob, set by the admin tools

properties.name: Data
properties.description: a dictionary object of key / value pairs

properties.name: Count
properties.description: limits the results to the last n entries (defaults to 10 if not set)

properties.name: News
properties.description: array of news items

properties.name: PlayFabId
properties.description: PlayFabId of the user to load info about. Defaults to yourself if not set.

properties.name: GetAccountInfo
properties.description: If set to false, account info will not be returned (defaults to true)

properties.name: GetInventory
properties.description: If set to false, inventory will not be returned (defaults to true). Inventory will never be returned for users other than yourself.

properties.name: GetVirtualCurrency
properties.description: If set to false, virtual currency balances will not be returned (defaults to true). Currency balances will never be returned for users other than yourself.

properties.name: GetUserData
properties.description: If set to false, custom user data will not be returned (defaults to true).

properties.name: UserDataKeys
properties.description: User custom data keys to return. Leave null to get all keys. For users other than yourself, only public data will be returned.

properties.name: GetReadOnlyData
properties.description: If set to false, read-only user data will not be returned (defaults to true).

properties.name: ReadOnlyDataKeys
properties.description: User read-only custom data keys to return. Leave null to get all keys. For users other than yourself, only public data will be returned.

properties.name: PlayFabId
properties.description: PlayFabId of the owner of the combined info

properties.name: AccountInfo
properties.description: account information for the user

properties.name: Inventory
properties.description: array of inventory items in the user's current inventory

properties.name: VirtualCurrency
properties.description: array of virtual currency balance(s) belonging to the user

properties.name: Data
properties.description: user specific custom data

properties.name: ReadOnlyData
properties.description: user specific read-only data

properties.name: Keys
properties.description: specific keys to search for in the custom user data. Leave null to get all keys.

properties.name: PlayFabId
properties.description: PlayFabId of the user to load data for. Optional, defaults to yourself if not set.

properties.name: Data
properties.description: user specific data for this title

properties.name: Inventory
properties.description: array of inventory items in the user's current inventory

properties.name: VirtualCurrency
properties.description: array of virtual currency balance(s) belonging to the user

properties.name: UserStatistics
properties.description: user statistics for the active title

ItemInstance.name: ItemInstance
ItemInstance.description: A unique instance of an item in a user's inventory

properties.name: ItemId
properties.description: unique identifier for the inventory item, as defined in the catalog

properties.name: ItemInstanceId
properties.description: unique item identifier for this specific instance of the item

properties.name: ItemClass
properties.description: class name for the inventory item, as defined in the catalog

properties.name: PurchaseDate
properties.description: timestamp for when this instance was purchased

properties.name: Expiration
properties.description: timestamp for when this instance will expire

properties.name: RemainingUses
properties.description: total number of remaining uses, if this is a consumable item

properties.name: Annotation
properties.description: game specific comment associated with this instance when it was added to the user inventory

properties.name: CatalogVersion
properties.description: catalog version for the inventory item, when this instance was created

properties.name: BundleParent
properties.description: unique identifier for the parent inventory item, as defined in the catalog, for object which were added from a bundle or container

properties.name: ItemId
properties.description: unique ItemId of the item to purchase

properties.name: Quantity
properties.description: how many of this item to purchase

properties.name: Annotation
properties.description: title-specific text concerning this purchase

properties.name: UpgradeFromItems
properties.description: items to be upgraded as a result of this purchase (upgraded items are hidden, as they are "replaced" by the new items)

properties.name: AccessToken
properties.description: unique identifier from Facebook for the user

properties.name: GameCenterId
properties.description: Game Center identifier for the player account to be linked

properties.name: SteamTicket
properties.description: unique identifier from Steam for the user

properties.name: eventName
properties.description: A unique event name which will be used as the table name in the Redshift database. The name will be made lower case, and cannot not contain spaces. The use of underscores is recommended, for readability. Events also cannot match reserved terms. The PlayFab reserved terms are 'log_in' and 'purchase', 'create' and 'request', while the Redshift reserved terms can be found here: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/redshift/latest/dg/r_pg_keywords.html.

properties.name: Body
properties.description: Contains all the data for this event. Event Values can be strings, booleans or numerics (float, double, integer, long) and must be consistent on a per-event basis (if the Value for Key 'A' in Event 'Foo' is an integer the first time it is sent, it must be an integer in all subsequent 'Foo' events). As with event names, Keys must also not use reserved words (see above). Finally, the size of the Body for an event must be less than 32KB (UTF-8 format).

properties.name: SessionTicket
properties.description: a unique token identifying the user and game at the server level, for the current session

properties.name: TitleId
properties.description: unique identifier for the title, found in the Settings > Game Properties section of the PlayFab developer site when a title has been selected

properties.name: AndroidDeviceId
properties.description: Android device identifier for the user's device

properties.name: OS
properties.description: specific Operating System version for the user's device

properties.name: AndroidDevice
properties.description: specific model of the user's device

properties.name: CreateAccount
properties.description: automatically create a PlayFab account if one is not currently linked to this iOS device

properties.name: TitleId

properties.name: BuildVersion
properties.description: build version to match against

properties.name: Region
properties.description: region to match make against

properties.name: GameMode
properties.description: game mode to match make against

properties.name: LobbyId
properties.description: lobby identifier to match make against (used to select a specific server)

properties.name: EnableQueue
properties.description: used to allow the user to wait in a queue to join the server, if it is full (only valid if LobbyId is specified)

properties.name: LobbyID
properties.description: unique lobby identifier of the server matched

properties.name: ServerHostname
properties.description: IP address of the server

properties.name: ServerPort
properties.description: port number to use for non-http communications with the server

properties.name: WebSocketPort
properties.description: port number to use for http communications with the server

properties.name: Ticket
properties.description: server authorization ticket (used by RedeemCoupon to validate user insertion into the game)

properties.name: Expires
properties.description: timestamp for when the server will expire, if applicable

properties.name: PollWaitTimeMS
properties.description: time in milliseconds the application is configured to wait on matchmaking results

properties.name: Status
properties.description: result of match making process

properties.name: Queue
properties.description: queue of unique user identifiers of players waiting to join this game (the current user will be at the end of this list)

properties.name: VirtualCurrency
properties.description: name of the virtual currency which was modified

properties.name: Balance
properties.description: balance of the virtual currency after modification

properties.name: OrderId
properties.description: purchase order identifier returned from StartPurchase

properties.name: ProviderName

properties.name: Currency

properties.description: items granted to the player as a result of unlocking the container

properties.name: VirtualCurrency
properties.description: virtual currency granted to the player as a result of unlocking the container

properties.name: Email
properties.description: user email address, used for account password recovery

properties.name: Password
properties.description: password for the account to be signed in (6-24 characters)

properties.name: SharedGroupId
properties.description: Unique identifier for the shared group.

properties.name: Data
properties.description: data to be written to the shared group. A key with a null value will be removed, rather than being set to null. Keys are trimmed of whitespace and must not begin with a '!' character.

properties.name: Permission
properties.description: Permission to be applied to all user data keys written in this request. Defaults to "private" if not set.

properties.name: Data
properties.description: data to be written to the user's custom data. A key with a null value will be removed, rather than being set to null.

properties.name: Permission
properties.description: Permission to be applied to all user data keys written in this request. Defaults to "private" if not set.

properties.name: UserStatistics
properties.description: statistics to be updated with the provided values

properties.name: DisplayName
properties.description: new title display name for the user - must be between 3 and 25 characters

properties.name: DisplayName
properties.description: current title display name for the user (this will be the original display name if the rename attempt failed)

properties.name: PlayFabId
properties.description: unique identifier for the user account

properties.name: Created
properties.description: timestamp indicating when the user account was created

properties.name: Username
properties.description: user account name in the PlayFab service

properties.name: TitleInfo
properties.description: title-specific information for the user account

properties.name: PrivateInfo
properties.description: personal information for the user which is considered more sensitive

properties.name: FacebookInfo
properties.description: user Facebook information, if a Facebook account has been linked

properties.name: SteamInfo
properties.description: user Steam information, if a Steam account has been linked

properties.name: GameCenterInfo
properties.description: user Gamecenter information, if a Gamecenter account has been linked

properties.name: Value
properties.description: data stored for the specified user data key

properties.name: LastUpdated
properties.description: timestamp for when this data was last updated

properties.name: Permission
properties.description: Permissions on this data key

properties.name: FacebookId
properties.description: Facebook identifier

properties.name: FacebookUsername
properties.description: Facebook username

properties.name: FacebookDisplayname
properties.description: Facebook display name

properties.name: GameCenterId
properties.description: Gamecenter identifier

properties.name: Email
properties.description: user email address

properties.name: SteamId
properties.description: Steam identifier

properties.name: SteamCountry
properties.description: the country in which the player resides, from Steam data

properties.name: SteamCurrency
properties.description: currency type set in the user Steam account

properties.name: SteamActivationStatus
properties.description: what stage of game ownership the user is listed as being in, from Steam

properties.name: DisplayName
properties.description: name of the game, as it is displayed in-game

properties.name: Origination
properties.description: source by which the user first joined the game, if known

properties.name: Created
properties.description: timestamp indicating when the user was first associated with this game (this can differ significantly from when the user first registered with PlayFab)

properties.name: LastLogin
properties.description: timestamp for the last user login for this title

properties.name: FirstLogin
properties.description: timestamp indicating when the user first signed into this game (this can differ from the Created timestamp, as other events, such as issuing a beta key to the user, can associate the title to the user)

properties.name: isBanned
properties.description: boolean indicating whether or not the user is currently banned for a title

properties.name: ReceiptJson
properties.description: The original json string returned by the Google Play IAB api

properties.name: Signature
properties.description: The signature returned by the Google Play IAB api

properties.name: ReceiptData
properties.description: base64 encoded receipt data, passed back by the App Store as a result of a successful purchase

properties.name: ObjectName
properties.description: name of the object purchased from the App store (must match the ItemId in the PlayFab catalog)

properties.name: CurrencyCode
properties.description: currency used for the purchase

properties.name: PurchasePrice
properties.description: amount of the stated currency paid for the object

calls.name: LoginWithAndroidDeviceID
calls.summary: Signs the user in using the Android device identifier, returning a session identifier that can subsequently be used for API calls which require an authenticated user
calls.requestDetails: If this is the first time a user has signed in with the Android device, the CreateAccount flag will be used to determine whether a new PlayFab account should be created and linked to the Android device ID. In this case, no email or username will be associated with the PlayFab account. If CreateAccount is set to false and no PlayFab account is linked to the Android device, an error indicating this will be returned, so that the title can guide the user through creation of a PlayFab account.

calls.name: LoginWithFacebook
calls.summary: Signs the user in using a Facebook access token, returning a session identifier that can subsequently be used for API calls which require an authenticated user
calls.requestDetails: If this is the first time a user has signed in with the Facebook account, the CreateAccount flag will be used to determine whether a new PlayFab account should be created and linked to the provided account's Facebook ID. In this case, no email or username will be associated with the PlayFab account. If CreateAccount is set to false and no PlayFab account is linked to the Facebook account, an error indicating this will be returned, so that the title can guide the user through creation of a PlayFab account.

calls.name: LoginWithGoogleAccount
calls.summary: Signs the user in using a Google account access token, returning a session identifier that can subsequently be used for API calls which require an authenticated user
calls.requestDetails: If this is the first time a user has signed in with the Google account, the CreateAccount flag will be used to determine whether a new PlayFab account should be created and linked to the provided account's Google ID. In this case, no email or username will be associated with the PlayFab account. If CreateAccount is set to false and no PlayFab account is linked to the Google account, an error indicating this will be returned, so that the title can guide the user through creation of a PlayFab account.

calls.name: LoginWithIOSDeviceID
calls.summary: Signs the user in using the vendor-specific iOS device identifier, returning a session identifier that can subsequently be used for API calls which require an authenticated user
calls.requestDetails: If this is the first time a user has signed in with the iOS device, the CreateAccount flag will be used to determine whether a new PlayFab account should be created and linked to the vendor-specific iOS device ID. In this case, no email or username will be associated with the PlayFab account. If CreateAccount is set to false and no PlayFab account is linked to the iOS device, an error indicating this will be returned, so that the title can guide the user through creation of a PlayFab account.

calls.name: LoginWithPlayFab
calls.summary: Signs the user into the PlayFab account, returning a session identifier that can subsequently be used for API calls which require an authenticated user
calls.requestDetails: Username and password lengths are provided for information purposes. The server will validate that data passed in conforms to the field definition and report errors appropriately. It is recommended that developers not perform this validation locally, so that future updates to the username or password do not require client updates.

calls.name: LoginWithSteam
calls.summary: Signs the user in using a Steam authentication ticket, returning a session identifier that can subsequently be used for API calls which require an authenticated user
calls.requestDetails: If this is the first time a user has signed in with the Steam account, the CreateAccount flag will be used to determine whether a new PlayFab account should be created and linked to the provided account's Steam ID. In this case, no email or username will be associated with the PlayFab account. If CreateAccount is set to false and no PlayFab account is linked to the Steam account, an error indicating this will be returned, so that the title can guide the user through creation of a PlayFab account.

calls.name: RegisterPlayFabUser
calls.summary: Registers a new Playfab user account, returning a session identifier that can subsequently be used for API calls which require an authenticated user
calls.resultDetails: Each account must have a unique email address in the PlayFab service. Once created, the account may be associated with additional accounts (Steam, Facebook, Game Center, etc.), allowing for added social network lists and achievements systems.

calls.name: SendAccountRecoveryEmail
calls.summary: Forces an email to be sent to the registered email address for the user's account, with a link allowing the user to change the password
calls.requestDetails: If the account in question is a "temporary" account (for example, one that was created via a call to LoginFromIOSDeviceID), thisfunction will have no effect. Only PlayFab accounts which have valid email addresses will be able to receive a password reset email using this API.

calls.name: GetAccountInfo
calls.summary: Retrieves the user's PlayFab account details
calls.resultDetails: This API retrieves details regarding the user in the PlayFab service. Note that data returned may contain Personally Identifying Information (PII), such as email address, and so care should be taken in how this data is stored and managed. Since this call will always return the relevant information for the user, the recommendation is to not store this data locally.

calls.name: GetUserCombinedInfo
calls.summary: Retrieves all requested data for a user in one unified request. By default, this API returns all  data for the locally signed-in user. The input parameters may be used to limit the data retrieved any any subset of the available data, as well as retrieve the available data for a different user. Note that certain data, including inventory, virtual currency balances, and personally identifying information, may only be retrieved for the locally signed-in user. In the example below, a request is made for the account details, virtual currency balances, and specified user data for the locally signed-in user.
calls.resultDetails: This API retrieves details regarding the user in the PlayFab service. Note that data returned for the locally signed-in user may contain Personally Identifying Information (PII), such as email address, and so care should be taken in how this data is stored and managed. Since this call will always return the relevant information for the user, the recommendation is to not store this data locally.

calls.name: LinkFacebookAccount
calls.summary: Links the Facebook account associated with the provided Facebook access token to the user's PlayFab account

calls.name: LinkGameCenterAccount
calls.summary: Links the Game Center account associated with the provided Game Center ID to the user's PlayFab account

calls.name: LinkSteamAccount
calls.summary: Links the Steam account associated with the provided Steam authentication ticket to the user's PlayFab account

calls.name: UnlinkFacebookAccount
calls.summary: Unlinks the related Facebook account from the user's PlayFab account

calls.name: UnlinkGameCenterAccount
calls.summary: Unlinks the related Game Center account from the user's PlayFab account

calls.name: UnlinkSteamAccount
calls.summary: Unlinks the related Steam account from the user's PlayFab account

calls.name: UpdateEmailAddress
calls.summary: Updates the local user's email address in PlayFab
calls.requestDetails: At this time, the email address is validated for correctness, but no verification email is sent to the address in question.

calls.name: UpdatePassword
calls.summary: Updates the local user's password in PlayFab
calls.requestDetails: Passwords are required to be between 6 and 20 characters in length.

calls.name: UpdateUserTitleDisplayName
calls.summary: Updates the title specific display name for the user
calls.requestDetails: In addition to the PlayFab username, titles can make use of a DisplayName which is also a unique identifier, but specific to the title. This allows for unique names which more closely match the theme or genre of a title, for example.

calls.name: GetLeaderboard
calls.summary: Retrieves a list of ranked users for the given statistic, starting from the indicated point in the leaderboard
calls.resultDetails: Note that the Position of the user in the results is for the overall leaderboard.

calls.name: GetLeaderboardAroundCurrentUser
calls.summary: Retrieves a list of ranked users for the given statistic, centered on the currently signed-in user
calls.resultDetails: Note that the Position of the user in the results is for the overall leaderboard.

calls.name: GetUserData
calls.summary: Retrieves the title-specific custom data for the user which is readable and writable by the client
calls.requestDetails: Data is stored as JSON key-value pairs. If the Keys parameter is provided, the data object returned will only contain the data specific to the indicated Keys. Otherwise, the full set of custom user data will be returned.

calls.name: GetUserReadOnlyData
calls.summary: Retrieves the title-specific custom data for the user which can only be read by the client
calls.requestDetails: Data is stored as JSON key-value pairs. If the Keys parameter is provided, the data object returned will only contain the data specific to the indicated Keys. Otherwise, the full set of custom user data will be returned.

calls.name: GetUserStatistics
calls.summary: Retrieves the details of all title-specific statistics for the user
calls.resultDetails: User statistics are numeric values which may only be updated by a server opeartion, in order to minimize the opportunity for unauthorized changes. In addition to being available for use by the title, the statistics are used for all leaderboard operations in PlayFab.

calls.name: UpdateUserData
calls.summary: Creates and updates the title-specific custom data for the user which is readable and writable by the client
calls.requestDetails: This function performs an additive update of the arbitrary strings containing the custom data for the user. In updating the custom data object, keys which already exist in the object will have their values overwritten, while keys with null values will be removed. New keys will be added, with the given values. No other key-value pairs will be changed apart from those specified in the call.

calls.name: UpdateUserStatistics
calls.summary: Updates the values of the specified title-specific statistics for the user
calls.requestDetails: This operation is additive. Statistics not currently defined will be added, while those already defined will be updated with the given values. All other user statistics will remain unchanged. This API must be enabled for use as an option in the game manager website. It is disabled by default.
calls.resultDetails: User statistics are numeric values which may only be updated by a server operation, in order to minimize the opportunity for unauthorized changes. In addition to being available for use by the title, the statistics are used for all leaderboard operations in PlayFab.

calls.name: GetCatalogItems
calls.summary: Retrieves the specified version of the title's catalog of virtual goods, including all defined properties
calls.resultDetails: If CatalogVersion is not specified, only inventory items associated with the most recent version of the catalog will be returned.

calls.name: GetStoreItems
calls.summary: Retrieves the list of catalog items for sale in a particular virutal store, including that store's pricing.

calls.name: GetTitleData
calls.summary: Retrieves the key-value store of custom title settings
calls.requestDetails: This API is designed to return title specific values which can be read, but not written to, by the client. For example, a developer could choose to store values which modify the user experience, such as enemy spawn rates, weapon strengths, movement speeds, etc. This allows a developer to update the title without the need to create, test, and ship a new build.

calls.name: GetTitleNews
calls.summary: Retrieves the title news feed, as configured in the developer portal

calls.name: AddUserVirtualCurrency
calls.summary: Increments the user's balance of the specified virtual currency by the stated amount
calls.requestDetails: This API must be enabled for use as an option in the game manager website. It is disabled by default.

calls.name: ConfirmPurchase
calls.summary: Confirms with the payment provider that the purchase was approved (if applicable) and adjusts inventory and virtual currency balances as appropriate
calls.requestDetails: The final step in the purchasing process, this API finalizes the purchase with the payment provider, where applicable, adding virtual goods to the player inventory (including random drop table resolution and recursive addition of bundled items) and adjusting virtual currency balances for funds used or added. Note that this is a pull operation, and should be polled regularly when a purchase is in progress.

calls.name: ConsumeItem
calls.summary: Consume uses of a consumable item. When all uses are consumed, it will be removed from the player's inventory.

calls.name: GetUserInventory
calls.summary: Retrieves the user's current inventory of virtual goods
calls.resultDetails: All items currently in the user inventory will be returned, irrespective of how they were acquired (via purchasing, grants, coupons, etc.). Items that are expired, fully consumed, or are no longer valid are not considered to be in the user's current inventory, and so will not be not included.

calls.name: PayForPurchase
calls.summary: Selects a payment option for purchase order created via StartPurchase
calls.requestDetails: This is the second step in the purchasing process, initiating the purchase transaction with the payment provider (if applicable). Note that there may be significant delays in responses from purchase providers - it is therefore recommended that the title not block on this operation, or (at a minimum) provide visual feedback to the user that the operation is pending.
calls.resultDetails: For web-based payment providers, this operation returns the URL to which the user should be directed inorder to approve the purchase. Items added to the user inventory as a result of this operation will be marked as unconfirmed.

calls.name: PurchaseItem
calls.summary: Buys a single item with virtual currency. You must specify both the virtual currency to use to purchase, as well as what the client believes the price to be. This lets the server fail the purchase if the price has changed.

calls.name: RedeemCoupon
calls.summary: Adds the virtual goods associated with the coupon to the user's inventory
calls.requestDetails: Coupon codes can be created for any item, or set of items, in the catalog for the title. This operation causes the coupon to be consumed, and the specific items to be awarded to the user. Attempting to re-use an already consumed code, or a code which has not yet been created in the service, will result in an error.

calls.name: StartPurchase
calls.summary: Creates an order for a list of items from the title catalog
calls.requestDetails: This is the first step in the purchasing process. For security purposes, once the order (or "cart") has been created, additional inventory objects may no longer be added. In addition, inventory objects will be locked to the current prices, regardless of any subsequent changes at the catalog level which may occur during the next two steps.

calls.name: SubtractUserVirtualCurrency
calls.summary: Decrements the user's balance of the specified virtual currency by the stated amount
calls.requestDetails: This API must be enabled for use as an option in the game manager website. It is disabled by default.

calls.name: UnlockContainerItem
calls.summary: Unlocks a container item in the user's inventory and consumes a key item of the type indicated by the container item
calls.requestDetails: Container items and their associated unlocking items ("crates" and "keys") are paired inventory objects which provide developers with a secure way to have an object which requires another object to activate, without providing the client with the opportunity to use replay attacks, packet blocking, or similar techniques to gain the objects in the container illegitimately.
calls.resultDetails: As a result of this operation, the inventory objects defined as belonging to the container will be added to the user's inventory, including random drop table resolution and recursive addition of bundled items.

calls.name: AddFriend
calls.summary: Adds the PlayFab user, based upon a match against a supplied unique identifier, to the friend list of the local user

calls.name: GetFriendsList
calls.summary: Retrieves the current friend list for the local user, constrained to users who have PlayFab accounts
calls.requestDetails: This operations refreshes the friend list of the local user, including querying all linked accounts.
calls.resultDetails: The list returned can be a mixture of friends from Steam, Facebook and PlayFab, though  Facebook friends will only be those who signed info the game via Facebook.

calls.name: RemoveFriend
calls.summary: Removes a specified user from the friend list of the local user

calls.name: SetFriendTags
calls.summary: Updates the tag list for a specified user in the friend list of the local user
calls.requestDetails: This operation is not additive. It will completely replace the tag list for the specified user.

calls.name: RegisterForIOSPushNotification
calls.summary: Registers the iOS device to receive push notifications

calls.name: ValidateIOSReceipt
calls.summary: Validates with the Apple store that the receipt for an iOS in-app purchase is valid and that it matches the purchased catalog item
calls.requestDetails: The ObjectName, CurrecncyCode, and PurcahsePrice are defined in the Apple store. The ObjectName must match the ItemId of the inventory item in the PlayFab catalog for the title. This enables the PlayFab service to securely validate that the purchase is for the correct item, in order to prevent uses from passing valid receipts as being for more expensive items (passing a receipt for a 99-cent purchase as being for a $19.99 purchase, for example).
calls.resultDetails: Once verified, the catalog item matching the iTunes item name will be added to the user's inventory.

calls.name: GetCurrentGames
calls.summary: Get details about all current running game servers matching the given parameters.

calls.name: GetGameServerRegions
calls.summary: Get details about the regions hosting game servers matching the given parameters.

calls.name: GetRegionPlaylists
calls.summary: Get statistics about game server mode playlists.

calls.name: Matchmake
calls.summary: Assign the current player to an existing or new game server matching the given parameters and return the connection information.

calls.name: StartGame
calls.summary: Start a new game server with a given configuration, add the current player and return the connection information.

calls.name: AndroidDevicePushNotificationRegistration
calls.summary: Registers the Android device to receive push notifications

calls.name: ValidateGooglePlayPurchase
calls.summary: Validates a Google Play purchase and gives the corresponding item to the player.
calls.requestDetails: The packageName and productId are defined in the GooglePlay store. The productId must match the ItemId of the inventory item in the PlayFab catalog for the title. This enables the PlayFab service to securely validate that the purchase is for the correct item, in order to prevent uses from passing valid receipts as being for more expensive items (passing a receipt for a 99-cent purchase as being for a $19.99 purchase, for example). Each receipt may be validated only once to avoid granting the same item over and over from a single purchase.
calls.resultDetails: Once verified, the catalog item (ItemId) matching the GooglePlay store item (productId) will be added to the user's inventory.

calls.name: LogEvent
calls.summary: Logs a custom analytics event
calls.requestDetails: This API is designed to track analytics events. Events logged using this API will be stored in the title's Redshift database. Each unique eventName will create a distinct table within the database. Within that table, a column will be created for every unique key. Using a first-person shooter as an example, the title may need to track headshots as a distinct event. The sample request below demonstrates an example of this. In addition to the values sent, timestamps and User IDs are automically added as 'ts' and 'user_id' to each table. The 'Headshot' table in this example would then have the schema: 'user_id'|'ts'|'victim'|'gun'|'x_coord'|'y_coord'|'z_coord'|'damage|aim_assist' and the row corresponding to this event would look like: 'EF987654ABAB012'|'2014-1-1 12:12:12'|'B76543AEAE65'|'big_bad_sniper'|10|20|1|1000|1.The PlayFab service automatically creates events for all login and purchase operations. This API is intended for game specific events only.

calls.name: AddSharedGroupMembers
calls.summary: Adds new members to the group. Only existing group members can add new members

calls.name: CreateSharedGroup
calls.summary: Requests the creation of a shared group object. It will be created with the current user as its only member.
calls.requestDetails: If you specify an ID for the object, you will get an error back if that ID is already in use. If you do not specify an ID, a random one will be used.

calls.name: GetSharedGroupData
calls.summary: Gets data in a shared group object. You may load data, the member list, or both at once. Non-members of the group may use this to load group data, including membership, but will not get data keys marked as private.

calls.name: RemoveSharedGroupMembers
calls.summary: Removes members from the group. Only existing group members can remove members. Removing all members (including yourself) deletes the group completely.

calls.name: UpdateSharedGroupData
calls.summary: Adds or updates data keys to a shared group object. Data written to the group is readable only by members of the group unless marked public. Only group members can update data.
